structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
The Governor, Lieutenant Governor And Council, Certain Officers Under The Governor And Council, And State Library

law.catch_line: Applicants For Medical Assistance Who Do Not Qualify For Cash Assistance Under Section 131; Determination As “Blind”
law.text: Upon receipt of an application for medical assistance from a blind individual who does not qualify for cash assistance under the provisions of section one hundred and thirty-one, the commission shall determine whether said individual meets the definition of “blind” in title XVI of the federal Social Security Act and the regulations established thereunder.
